'''Call of the Abyss''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during [[Archon Quest]] [[Chapter I]]: Act IV - [[We Will Be Reunited]] quests "[[Involuntary Sacrifice]]" and "[[A Soul Set Apart]]".

==Chests==
*'''Involuntary Sacrifice'''
**7 Common Chests
*'''A Soul Set Apart'''
**2 Common Chests
**1 Precious Chest

==Walkthrough==
===Involuntary Sacrifice===
# Enter the Domain
# Door opens on right
# Fall down and defeat opponents
#* {{Enemy List|Hydro Samachurl;Cryo Hilichurl Shooter;Hilichurl Fighter*3|#*}}
#* There is a Common Chest here
# [[Bubble]] Challenge
#* There is a Common Chest in the second left gap
#* There is a Common Chest in the second right gap
# Fall down hole
#* There is a Common Chest here
# Cutscene with Treasure Hoarder and Defiled Statue
# Ground starts to damage player, exit in corner of room
# Bubble Challenge
#* There is a Common Chest in the left gap
#* There is a Common Chest in the second left gap
# Top of Bubble Challenge
#* There is a Common Chest here
# Go up stairs and defeat opponent
#* {{Enemy|Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents|x=1}}
# Domain is automatically exited

===A Soul Set Apart===
# Enter the Domain
# Door opens on left
# Bubble Challenge
#* There is a Common Chest in the left gap
#* There is a Common Chest in the second left gap
# Cutscene with Defiled Statue and Abyss Herald
# Defeat opponents
#*{{Enemy List|Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents;Hydro Abyss Mage;Pyro Abyss Mage|#*}}
# Cutscene with Abyss Herald fight and Traveler's Sibling
# Complete Quest
#* A Precious Chest appears before the exit.

==Completion Rewards==
Rewards are only obtained when entering during [[A Soul Set Apart]].
{{Card|Adventurer's Experience|2}}
{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|2}}
{{Card|Mora|10,000}}

==Trivia==
* The ruins feature several sections that resemble The Great Bubble Crash in the [[Peculiar Wonderland]] event, except here, the bubbles are purple. In the second section featuring the purple bubbles, the platforms below the player will fall over time.
